        public static boolean addStudent​(java.lang.String Name,
                                 java.lang.String Password,
                                 java.lang.String Email,
                                 java.util.Calendar dob,
                                 java.lang.String MatricNo,
                                 java.lang.String SchoolID,
                                 java.lang.String Degree)
        This function is used to add a new Student to the database. The logic flow happens in this function
        Parameters:
        Name - - Name of the Student
        Password - - Password of the Student
        Email - - Email ID of the Student
        dob - - Date of birth of the Student
        MatricNo - - Matriculation Number of the Student
        SchoolID - - School the student studies in
        Degree - - refers to his/her Major
        Returns:
